SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SYNC MANAGEMENT
Deployment Packages

Customize the Consumer Goods Cloud Offline Mobile app by using Consumer Goods Cloud Modeler. Use deployment packages to expedite the deployment of customizations to the app users of your org by uploading your customizations in a zipped deployment file.

A deployment package downloads during each synchronization (including the background sync) of a mobile device after you attach the deployment package. However, the deployment package is applied only when the Consumer Goods mobile offline app starts.

Create a Deployment Package
Create deployment packages to expedite the deployment of customizations to the app users of your org by uploading your customizations in a zipped deployment file. After creating a deployment package, create deployment package assignments to assign users who can use the deployment package.
Upload a Deployment Package
You can upload a deployment package zip of a maximum of 10 MB from the Deployment Packages page in Salesforce. To upload a deployment package that exceeds 10 MB, use the Upload New Version option in Salesforce Files.
Revoke a Deployment Package
When you no longer need a customization, revoke a deployment package.
View Deployment Package Installation Details
To get the details of a deployment package, view the details of the installations.
Downloading Latest Metadata
If you haven’t made metadata changes from the Sync Configurator tab, for example field sets or permission sets, force the update.
